title: City of Lights from Above
description: Kochi becomes even more captivating after dark. Captured the city’s charm from above with my drone — there's a quiet magic in the lights and the calmness seen from the sky.

title: Air Race Launch at Wonderla Kochi
description: We had the privilege of capturing Wonderla Kochi’s latest attraction, Air Race, from a whole new perspective. From the grand ribbon-cutting to the adrenaline-filled first ride, our drone lenses were in the sky to document every thrilling moment.

title: Royal Drive Kochi from Above
description: Captured the essence of luxury at Royal Drive SMART, Kochi — South India's premier destination for pre-owned exotic automobiles. From Porsche to BMW to Mercedes, the collection speaks for itself. Proud to present this exclusive space from an elevated perspective through our lens.

title: Kochi Water Metro’s New Journey
description: Charting new routes to the future as Kochi’s Water Metro sails ahead with the inauguration of the Eloor terminal. Capturing this milestone moment from the sky to showcase progress and connectivity.

title: Travel Blog CMS
description: A custom content management system for travel bloggers with rich text editor and photo gallery support.

title: E-Commerce Storefront
description: A modern e-commerce site built with MERN stack featuring product filtering, cart, and payment integration.
